statements: SELECT * FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants;
SELECT user_id, feedback_message FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT virtual_assistant_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants GROUP BY virtual_assistant_id;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7;
SELECT * FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants WHERE feedback_message LIKE '%good%';
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants;
SELECT * FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, virtual_assistant_id, sentiment_score, feedback_message FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2;
SELECT DISTINCT virtual_assistant_id FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants ORDER BY virtual_assistant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserSentimentAndFeedbackForVirtualAssistants WHERE feedback_message IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id, virtual_assistant_id DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM virtual_assistants;
SELECT name, sentiment_score FROM virtual_assistants;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants WHERE id = 5;
SELECT feedback, sentiment_score, name FROM virtual_assistants;
SELECT id, sentiment_score, name, feedback FROM virtual_assistants;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, sentiment_score FROM virtual_assistants WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC;
SELECT id, name, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM virtual_assistants;
SELECT id, name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM virtual_assistants GROUP BY id HAVING avg_score > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT v.id, v.name, u.sentiment, u.feedback FROM virtual_assistants v JOIN user_sentiments u ON v.id = u.assistant_id WHERE u.user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM UserSentiment;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback FROM UserSentiment WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_type FROM VirtualAssistant;
SELECT assistant_id, assistant_name, assistant_type FROM VirtualAssistant ORDER BY assistant_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_type FROM VirtualAssistant WHERE assistant_type = 'Chatbot' ORDER BY assistant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteraction WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteraction GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10;
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_timestamp) AS last_interaction FROM UserInteraction GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualAssistantFeedback;
SELECT id, user_id, feedback_text FROM VirtualAssistantUsage ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM VirtualAssistantFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM UserSentimentAnalysis WHERE positive_sentiment = TRUE AND negative_sentiment = FALSE;
SELECT feedback_id, analysis_result, analysis_date FROM FeedbackAnalysisResults WHERE analysis_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VirtualAssistantFeedback WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM VirtualAssistantFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT id, query_text, date FROM VirtualAssistantUsage WHERE user_id = 456 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT user_id, SUM(CASE WHEN positive_sentiment THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS positive_count, SUM(CASE WHEN negative_sentiment THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS negative_count FROM UserSentimentAnalysis GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT f.id AS feedback_id, f.feedback_text, r.analysis_result, r.analysis_date FROM VirtualAssistantFeedback f JOIN FeedbackAnalysisResults r ON f.id = r.feedback_id ORDER BY r.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_registered_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT activation_date, assistant_name, assistant_language FROM VirtualAssistantUsers WHERE assistant_language IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_description FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_country = 'USA';
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM VirtualAssistantFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, log_description, log_timestamp FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT assistant_name, activation_date FROM VirtualAssistantUsers WHERE user_id = 456 AND assistant_language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, analysis_result FROM UserSentimentAnalysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-12-31';
